titleInfo.title: Nashville Jubilee at the War Memorial

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing the Nashville Jubilee with Webb Pierce, Faron Young, Melba Montgomery, Stoneman Family , Harold Morrison, Patsy Sledd, and Roy Wiggins at the War Memorial Auditorium on May 28. Poster features metal photoplates of Webb Pierce, Faron Young, Melba Montgomery, Stoneman Family , Harold Morrison and Roy Wiggins.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
